using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;


namespace example
{
    
    
    public class GeneratedClass
    {
        
        public static readonly String A = "A";
        
        public static readonly String B = "B";
        
        public static readonly String C = "C";
        
        private static HashSet<string> Constants = new HashSet<string>(new string[] {
                    A,
                    B,
                    C});
        
        private string Value;
        
		public static implicit operator String(GeneratedClass d) => d.Value;
		public static explicit operator GeneratedClass(String v) => new GeneratedClass(v);
        
        // Hiding visiblity of default constructor
        private GeneratedClass()
        {
        }
        
        public GeneratedClass(String value)
        {
            if (!Constants.Contains(value))
            {
                throw new System.ArgumentException("Value is not part of enum");
            }
            Value = value;
        }
    }
}
